title: PLAINS OF MORDOR - Third Age Total War Gameplay
description:
Gondor has marched 2 great armies to the plains of Mordor!  The Dark Lord's power will be tested!  Will his army of darkness come out on top, or will Gondor wipe out the orc in Mordor!  Enjoy :D

If you enjoyed the video don't forget to Like and Leave a comment :D
